unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jasprit Bumrah's injury? Heard it's pretty bad. Dr. Patel said recovery might take longer than expected. Rs. 5 Lakh worth surgery, maybe? Also, is Pant still out? Hope he gets well soon. Heard the new stadium is 5000 sq ft. Let's hope India wins the upcoming series. Jai Hind! Are we playing in Eden Gardens?
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jasprit Bumrah's injury? Heard it's pretty bad. Doctor Patel said recovery might take longer than expected. Rupee five lakh worth surgery, maybe? Also, is Pant still out? Hope he gets well soon. Heard the new stadium is five thousand square feet. Let's hope India wins the upcoming series. Jai Hind! Are we playing in Eden Gardens?
